data.title: Librarian translator
data.statement:
tags: {{strings}}, {{regular expressions}}
You have to translate a sentence into Orang-utan.
This Orang-utan is the University of the Unseen's librarian who was once a human wizard. Now, he only talks with "Ook"s and "Eek"s.
Each word is replaced by{{Ook}}, {{ook}}, {{Eek}} or {{eek}}, guess how. The punctuation marks must be kept as is.

testCases.title: Ook eek.
testCases.testIn: Stay away from flying saucers today.
testCases.testOut: Ook eek ook ook ook ook.

testCases.title: Eek ook.
testCases.testIn: You need more time; and you probably always will.
testCases.testOut: Eek ook ook ook; eek eek ook eek ook.

testCases.title: Eek ook.
testCases.testIn: You will have a long and boring life.
testCases.testOut: Eek ook ook eek ook eek ook ook.

data.constraints:
The sentence is in pure 7-bit ASCII.
I won't ask the reversed translation.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

tags: strings, regular expressions
You have to translate a sentence into Orang-utan.
This Orang-utan is the University of the Unseen's librarian who was once a human wizard. Now, he only talks with "Ook"s and "Eek"s.
Each word is replaced byOok, ook, Eek or eek, guess how. The punctuation marks must be kept as is.
Input
A single sentence in English.
Output
Its translation in Orang-utan.
Constraints
The sentence is in pure 7-bit ASCII.
I won't ask the reversed translation.
Example
Input
Hello world.
Output
Ook ook.
